Name: Created
Description: The batch has been created, and assigned a name and specs.

Name: Assigned
Description: The batch is has had all the appropriate bins assigned and is ready to go.

Name: Shipped
Description: The batch has been shipped to the digitization facility.

Name: Returned
Description: The batch has been returned from the digitization facility.

Name: Complete
Description: All bins have been all checked in, and physical objects returned.
